content.query:
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

CREATE VIEW [taxi_db].[ml_mart]
AS SELECT
  EventEnqueuedUtcTime,
  trip_id,
  booking_source,
  day_of_week,
  drivers_review,
  estimated_arrival_time_in_m,
  time_of_day,
  traffic_conditions,
  weather_conditions
FROM taxi_db.taxi_calls_table
where EventEnqueuedUtcTime = (select max(EventEnqueuedUtcTime) from taxi_db.taxi_calls_table );
GO
